name: Shiba Inu
desc_fr: Le memecoin Shiba Inu fait japper les marchés. FIST garde l'œil ouvert.
desc_en: Shiba Inu is barking up the charts. FIST is watching.

name: Pepe
desc_fr: Pepe déclenche des soupçons... FIST dégaine.
desc_en: Pepe looks suspicious... FIST is on it.

name: Doge
desc_fr: Doge s'excite ? FIST garde son calme.
desc_en: Doge gets excited? FIST stays cool.
